    ObservableEndpoint

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add the provided sender to the registered publishers
      int countPublishers() 
      void deletePublisher(ISender sender)
      Delete the provided sender from the registered publishers

      Delete all registered publishers

    • Method Detail

      • addPublisher

        void addPublisher(ISender sender)
        Add the provided sender to the registered publishers
        Parameters:
        sender - the sender to be registered

      • deletePublishers

        void deletePublishers()
        Delete all registered publishers

      • deletePublisher

        void deletePublisher(ISender sender)
        Delete the provided sender from the registered publishers
        Parameters:
        sender - the sender to be deleted from the registered publishers

      • notifyPublishers

        void notifyPublishers(IToken token)
                      throws InterruptedException,
                             IOException,
                             InvalidConnectionString
        Notify all publishers for the availability of the provided token
        Parameters:
        token - the token that will be published in the registered publishers
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        IOException
        InvalidConnectionString

      • countPublishers

        int countPublishers()
        Returns:
        the current number of registered publishers
